items.title: The Professional Challenges of Industrial Designer in Industry 4.0
items.summary_en: The Industry 4.0 refers to a industrial ecology which will merge the information system, physical system and service system into an integrate platform. Since now the industrial designers either conceive the physical part of products, or design the User Interfaces of computer systems, the new industrial ecology will give them a chance to redefine their roles in R&D work-flow. Additionally, how to promote these qualities though educational program.
